def pan_to_start(event: KeyEvent):
        cur = plotter.get_x_limits()
        start_time = plotter.segments[0].start_seconds
        plotter.set_x_limits(start_time, start_time + cur.width)

    def pan_to_end(event: KeyEvent):
        cur = plotter.get_x_limits()
        end_time = plotter.segments[-1].end_seconds
        plotter.set_x_limits(end_time - cur.width, end_time)
